name: ActiveDirectory_Enrichment
author: Michael(github.com/ag-michael)
description: Look up ActiveDirectory for persons,computers and UPN's that are being tracked as observables.

configurationItems.name: computer_basedn
configurationItems.description: This should be a semicolon separated list of base distinguished names such as ',OU=Mycompany,OU=Workstations,DC=corp,DC=local'

configurationItems.name: person_basedn
configurationItems.description: This should be a semicolon separated list of base distinguished names such as ',OU=Branch,OU=UserAccounts,DC=corp,DC=local;,OU=HQ,OU=UserAccounts,DC=corp,DC=local'

configurationItems.name: serviceaccount
configurationItems.description: Service account name. used to bind to ldap
